title: 'Outstanding delivery' - Starc removes Root for a duck
text:
Mitchell Starc takes his third wicket of the morning session as Joe Root is caught for a duck at second slip by Marnus Labuschagne to leave England on 39-3 on day one of the first Ashes Test in Perth.

FOLLOW LIVE: The Ashes first Test - day one

Available to UK users only.
summary: Mitchell Starc takes his third wicket of the morning session as Joe Root is caught for a duck at second slip by Marnus Labuschagne to leave England on 39-3 on day one of the first Ashes Test in Perth.
